data.message: So, I like some of the things you've done, i like that you are a family man, and I like that you took Skyler Grey under your wing, but, you need to release her song, in its original format. The world deserves more than just a demo, or a Rihanna version from an award show. If my daughter wrote a hauntingly beautiful song, and it got turned into a good but still mundane rap-pop song, I'd be, to say the least, disapointed. As would any father.
